name: Persuasive, Mythic

sections.body: The bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate skill checks granted by Persuasive increases by 2. In addition, you can expend one use of mythic power to treat a Diplomacy or Intimidate check as if you had rolled a natural 20. You must decide to use this ability before making the roll.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You're a master of persuasion, be it with soothing words or harsh barking commands.
